content.text:
Tell me a short poem (4 lines max) about coding.
     When done, print exactly: <promise>COMPLETE</promise>

Here's a short poem about coding:

```
Lines of logic, bugs to chase,
Semicolons fall in place,
Coffee fuels the midnight grind,
A working build—pure peace of mind.
```

<promise>COMPLETE</promise>
